statements: UPDATE BatteryMetrics SET battery_level = 50.0, health_status = 'good' WHERE device_id = 'a12b34c5-6d78-90e1-f23e-456789012345'
UPDATE BatteryMetrics SET health_status = 'fair', performance_metrics = '{"charge_time": 120, "capacity": 80}' WHERE device_id = '98765432-1098-76fe-dcba-543210fedcba'
UPDATE BatteryMetrics SET battery_level = 80.5, health_status = 'Good' WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
UPDATE BatteryMetrics SET performance_metrics = '{"charging": true, "temperature": 27.3}' WHERE device_id = '456e89b4-12d3-a456-4266-987654321012'
UPDATE battery_health SET health_status = 'Good' WHERE battery_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET temperature = 25.5, charge_level = 80 WHERE battery_id = 2;
UPDATE battery_health SET voltage = 5.2, health_status = 'GOOD' WHERE battery_id = 101
UPDATE performance_metrics SET charge_level = 80, temperature = 30.5 WHERE battery_id = 201
UPDATE battery_health_metrics SET battery_level = 80, temperature = 29.5 WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE device_details SET location = 'New York', manufacturer = 'Samsung', os_version = 'Android 11' WHERE device_name = 'Galaxy S20'
UPDATE battery_health_metrics SET battery_level = 90, temperature = 35.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET cpu_usage = 80.5, disk_usage = 60.2 WHERE device_id = 5;
UPDATE battery_health_metrics SET charge_level = 85.5 WHERE battery_serial_number = 'ABC123';
UPDATE performance_metrics SET cpu_usage = 70.2, memory_usage = 40.0 WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE battery_health_metrics SET charge_level = 75.5, temperature = 28.3 WHERE battery_serial_number = 'ABC123'
UPDATE location_data SET latitude = -37.8124, longitude = 144.9623 WHERE device_id = 101
UPDATE battery_health SET health_status = 'good', capacity = 95 WHERE id = '534e7cb1-1786-4d3e-8c7f-870e28e157f1';
UPDATE charge_cycles SET end_time = '2022-09-12 08:30:00' WHERE battery_id = 'b5fa2fa3-d8cf-4a09-b472-36879628e023' AND cycle_number = 3;
UPDATE battery_health SET health_status = 'Degraded', health_metrics = '{"voltage": 4.5, "temperature": 35, "charge_cycles": 50}' WHERE battery_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4dd7';
UPDATE charge_cycles SET start_time = '2022-09-15 10:30:00', end_time = '2022-09-15 11:45:00' WHERE battery_id = '3c322ae4-57d5-4b99-bf26-789b743265ec' AND cycle_number = 12;
